mapper.select: /* 연도별 총 예산, 인당 최대 지원금 조회*/ SELECT BUDGET_NUM, OFFICER_ID, APPLY_YEAR, BUDGET_BY_PERSON, BUDGET_TOTAL_AMOUNT, REGIST_DT, UPDATE_DT FROM BUDGET_TOTAL

/* 연도별 지역 예산, 지역별 대상 인원 조회*/ SELECT b.BUDGET_REGION_NUM, b.APPLY_YEAR, b.REGION_CODE, r.REGION_NAME, b.OFFICER_ID, b.BUDGET_REGION_AMOUNT, b.MUNHWA_REGION_NOP, b.REGIST_DT, b.UPDATE_DT FROM BUDGET_REGION AS b INNER JOIN REGION AS r ON b.REGION_CODE = r.REGION_CODE ORDER BY b.APPLY_YEAR, b.REGION_CODE;
/* 검색된 연도의 전국 예산 조회 */ SELECT BUDGET_NUM, OFFICER_ID, APPLY_YEAR, BUDGET_BY_PERSON, BUDGET_TOTAL_AMOUNT, REGIST_DT, UPDATE_DT FROM BUDGET_TOTAL WHERE APPLY_YEAR = #{searchYear}
/* 특정 연도의 전국 예산 조회 */ SELECT BUDGET_NUM, OFFICER_ID, APPLY_YEAR, BUDGET_BY_PERSON, BUDGET_TOTAL_AMOUNT, REGIST_DT, UPDATE_DT FROM BUDGET_TOTAL WHERE APPLY_YEAR = #{searchYear}

/* 특정 연도 and 지역의 예산 조회 */ SELECT b.APPLY_YEAR, b.REGION_CODE, r.REGION_NAME, b.OFFICER_ID, b.BUDGET_REGION_AMOUNT, b.MUNHWA_REGION_NOP FROM BUDGET_REGION AS b INNER JOIN REGION AS r ON b.REGION_CODE = r.REGION_CODE WHERE b.BUDGET_REGION_NUM=#{budgetRegionNum};
mapper.insert: /* 전국 단위 예산 등록 */ INSERT INTO BUDGET_TOTAL( BUDGET_NUM, OFFICER_ID, APPLY_YEAR, BUDGET_BY_PERSON, BUDGET_TOTAL_AMOUNT, REGIST_DT, UPDATE_DT )VALUES( #{budgetNum}, #{officerId}, #{applyYear}, #{budgetByPerson}, #{budgetTotalAmount}*'100000000', CURDATE(), CURDATE() )

/* 지역 단위 예산 등록 */ INSERT INTO BUDGET_REGION( BUDGET_REGION_NUM, APPLY_YEAR, REGION_CODE, OFFICER_ID, BUDGET_REGION_AMOUNT, MUNHWA_REGION_NOP, REGIST_DT, UPDATE_DT )VALUES( #{budgetRegionNum}, #{applyYearRegion}, #{regionCode}, #{officerId}, #{budgetRegionAmount}, #{munhwaRegionNOP}, CURDATE(), CURDATE() )
mapper.select: /* 연도 중복 여부 검색 */ SELECT COUNT(APPLY_YEAR) FROM BUDGET_TOTAL WHERE APPLY_YEAR = #{applyYear}
/* 연도, 지역 중복 여부 검색 */ SELECT COUNT(BUDGET_REGION_NUM) FROM BUDGET_REGION WHERE APPLY_YEAR = #{applyYear} AND REGION_CODE = #{regionCode}
mapper.update: /* 지역 단위 예산 수정 */ UPDATE BUDGET_REGION SET OFFICER_ID = #{officerId}, BUDGET_REGION_AMOUNT=#{budgetRegionAmount}, MUNHWA_REGION_NOP=#{munhwaRegionNOP}, UPDATE_DT = CURDATE() WHERE BUDGET_REGION_NUM=#{budgetRegionNum};
